effect.sword_shield: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.the_crown_tundra: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
effect.legends_arceus: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.

short_effect.sword_shield: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.
